channel.title: Azure OpenAI on AI SYSTEMS TODAY
channel.description: Recent content in Azure OpenAI on AI SYSTEMS TODAY

item.title: Generative AI & Its Business Impact
item.description: Implementing ChatGPT-like Models with Azure OpenAI Service Introduction # In recent years, generative AI models like ChatGPT have transformed the AI landscape. These models can generate human-like text, write essays, code, and even conduct conversations.
